name: Together with you
description:
What happens when one of you has no arms, and the other one has no legs? You become best friends!

Features:
  • Solve puzzles with your best bud, using the environment around you and taking advantage of each one's strengths
  • Interact with multiple buttons and levels to unlock the exit
  • Cartoony graphics that will enforce your friendship
Credits:
  • Lovely graphics made by A bad artist
  • Music and sound effects made by Zickloze
DISCLAIMER Not actually a co-op game, you may play with a friend, but it remains untested wether you will have the same game experience

Game made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2021.
